definitions.text: a component or accessory added to something after it has been manufactured
the act of adding a component or accessory to something that did not have it when it was manufactured
examples: the court ordered a retrofit on all automobiles

definitions.text: provide with parts, devices, or equipment not available or in use at the time of the original manufacture
examples: They car companies retrofitted all the old models with new carburetors

definitions.text: fit in or on an existing structure, such as an older house
examples: The mansion was retrofitted with modern plumbing

definitions.text: substitute new or modernized parts or equipment for older ones
examples: The laboratory retrofitted to meet the safety codes
